aka: ハローキティ： スーパースタイル！
trans_title: Hello Kitty 魔法蝴蝶结 第一季
ハローキティ： スーパースタイル！
introduction: Say "Hello!" to "Hello Kitty: Super Style!" The beloved pop culture icon, Hello Kitty, stars in this animated CGI series as a stylish and courageously compassionate small-town hero! With the power of her magical bow, Hello Kitty helps friends in need by transforming into one of her power costumes (Chef, Athlete, Detective...) and uses her skills to problem solve and save the day!S1 E1 On A RollS1 E2 Friendship DayS1 E3 A Good SportS1 E4 Treasure HuntersS1 E5 A Bridge Between BeaversS1 E6 Disappearing Act
chinese_title: Hello Kitty 魔法蝴蝶结 第一季
